content: संतुष् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To be pleased, satisfied or contented; संतुष्टो भार्यया भर्ता भर्त्रा भार्या तथैव च <ls>Ms. 3. 60</ls>; <ls>Bh. 3. 5</ls>; <ls>Bg. 3. 17.</ls> {@--2@} To have great pleasure in. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To satisfy, please, gratify. {@--2@} To present with (anything).
